ygData.subject: RE: magical 2h-slashing
ygData.msgSnippet: I fully agree the BIB is much easier to get, the knight spawns about every 4 hours in my experience and he always has the sword.......the exp in that room is
ygData.messageBody:
I fully agree the BIB is much easier to get, the knight spawns about every 4
hours in my experience and he always has the sword.......the exp in that
room is great to and you tend to avoid evil eye trains.......unless some
blinded idiot wanders into the room with an EE chasing him (happened to my
party once) but if you are under lvl 28 or so I would recommend not leaving
the room.....(don't pull anything) just be patient and content with room
spawn and you should have no trouble..

Brennin

-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell [mailto:dlobdell@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 11:03 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing

From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>

The Blackened iron bastard sword is way better then the BBC though,
and in my opinion easier to get... As long as your lvl 24 plus, with a
party..

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want
to achieve
it through not dying."
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath,
original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet,
bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed
sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion,
curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate
mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways ;),
educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh
cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels,
idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE
OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'!!!!!!
-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David <DWHITCRAFT@...>
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 5:13 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing


>From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
>Lota of 2H Slashing magics out there. Go to EQ'Lizer for a good
list
>(http://gameznet.com/eq/). Bone Bladed Claymore is a very common
wanted 2H
>slashing. I sold one I got in Befallen for 350pp, but this was
about a month
>and a half ago. I imagine they go for about half this or less now,
although
>I'm not sure.
>
>Need to be about 16-20th level, in a party to get this item, and be
prepared
>to camp for hours on end. My party camped the lower level of
Befallen all
>day (12 hours) and we got 2 BBCs that day. Hrm...might have been 3.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:05 PM
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing
>

>
>thanks,
>Omeg
